description: A React component that provides a button to initiate OAuth connection to Jira by requesting an authorization URL from the backend and redirecting the user to it.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to start Jira OAuth flow, managing loading state and handling errors.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Event handler invoked on button click to fetch the OAuth URL from backend and redirect the user; manages loading state and error handling.
